Name: Grenspaal Roosteren-Susteren
description:
Type: Marker Stone County/Region: Gelderland
Pos Accuracy: 4 Condition: 4 (5 is best) Ambience: 4 Access: 5 (5 is best)
Lat: 52.00857    Long: 5.91348
Marker Stone in Gelderland. Sculptured monolith used as boundary post, dating back to the middle ages.
Originated from Limburg, in 1914 removed/placed here in the Open Air Museum, Arnhem.
.... (c) Meg. Portal contributors.
